ping: Dink! The ball knocks over {bot_nick}'s glass of lemonade.'
\*ping\*. {client_name} taps the ball, which brushes the net and falls onto {bot_nick}'s side.
Pling! The ball hits {bot_nick}'s chest and they dramatically fall over.
Pong! The ball is launched at the wall, going nowhere near the table.

nokills: The villagers discover the dead body of a beloved pet penguin, but lucklily no one was harmed.
The villagers discover the dead body of a beloved pet dog, but lucklily no one was harmed.
The villagers discover the dead body of a beloved pet cat, but lucklily no one was harmed.
Paw prints and tufts of fur are found circling the village, but everyone seems unharmed.
lynched: The villagers have agreed to lynch **{lynched_name}**, a **{lynched_role}**.
The villagers perform surgery to obtain the heart of **{lynched_name}**, now known to be a **{lynched_role}**. They put it in a plastic cup.
The villagers perform surgery to obtain the brains of **{lynched_name}**, now known to be a **{lynched_role}**. They seal it in a glass jar.
Reluctantly, the villagers lead **{lynched_name}** to the gallows, who is later found to be a **{lynched_role}**.
The villagers sacrifice **{lynched_name}** to the belunga god, who is satisfied with the **{lynched_role}** for now.
For SCIENCE, the villagers throw **{lynched_name}** into a volcano. They discover that the melting point of a **{lynched_role}** is less than that of lava.
The villagers force **{lynched_name}** to play Russian Roulette. The town square is stained with the remains of the **{lynched_role}**.
The villagers, after much debate, finally decide on lynching **{0}**, who turned out to be... a **{lynched_role}**.
After a prolonged struggle, **{lynched_name}** is forced to the gallows, and is discovered after death to be a **{lynched_role}**.
The villagers choose to hang **{lynched_name}**; however, the rope stretches and breaks, and the ensuing fall kills the **{lynched_role}**.
